presentationColumns.name: Revenue
presentationColumns.description: Activities for a period range for the REVENUE financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Revenue

presentationColumns.name: Cost of Revenue
presentationColumns.description: Activities for a period range for the COGS, PURCH and RM CONS financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Cost of Revenue

presentationColumns.name: Gross Profit
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Revenue - Cost of Revenue.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Gross Profit

presentationColumns.name: Gross Margin %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : (Gross Profit / Revenue) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Gross Margin %

presentationColumns.name: Payroll Cost
presentationColumns.description: Activities for a period range for sum of Financial Categories with these values: MKTG PAYROLL, SLS PAYROLL, R&D PAYROLL, and GEN PAYROLL.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Payroll Cost

presentationColumns.name: R&D Expenses
presentationColumns.description: Activities for a period range for sum of Financial Categories with these values: OTHER R&D EXP and R&D PAYROLL.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in R&D Expenses

presentationColumns.name: Sales & Marketing Expenses
presentationColumns.description: Activities for a period range for sum of Financial Categories with these values: MKTG PAYROLL, SLS PAYROLL, OTHER MKTG EXP, FREIGHT, OTHER SLS EXP, and TRAVEL & ENT EXP.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Sales & Marketing Expenses

presentationColumns.name: Other Operating Expenses
presentationColumns.description: Activities for a period range for sum of Financial Categories with these values: EMP BENFT, GEN PAYROLL, EMP SUPP, CONT EXP, EMP OVERTIME, VARIANCE EXP, MISC OPER EXP, and OTHER OPER EXP.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Other Operating Expenses

presentationColumns.name: Total Operating Expenses
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : R&D Expenses + Sales & Marketing Expenses + Other Operating Expenses.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Total Operating Expenses

presentationColumns.name: Operating Profit
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Revenue - Cost of Revenue - Total Operating Expenses.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Operating Profit

presentationColumns.name: Operating Margin %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : (Operating Profit / Revenue) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Operating Margin %

presentationColumns.name: Other Income
presentationColumns.description: Activities for a period range for the OTHER INC financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Other Income

presentationColumns.name: EBITDA
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Revenue - Cost of Revenue - Sales & Marketing Expenses - Other Operating Expenses - R&D Expense.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.EBITDA

presentationColumns.name: EBITDA Margin %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : (EBITDA / Revenue) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.EBITDA Margin %

presentationColumns.name: Depreciation Expenses
presentationColumns.description: Activities for a period range for the DEPCN financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Depreciation Expenses

presentationColumns.name: EBIT
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Revenue - Cost of Revenue - Sales & Marketing Expenses - Other Operating Expenses - R&D Expenses - Depreciation Expenses
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.EBIT

presentationColumns.name: EBIT Margin %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : (EBIT / Revenue) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.EBIT Margin %

presentationColumns.name: Interest Expense
presentationColumns.description: Activities for a period range for the INT EXP financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Interest Expense

presentationColumns.name: EBT
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Revenue - Cost of Revenue - Sales & Marketing Expenses - Other Operating Expenses - R&D Expenses - Interest Expense - Depreciation Expenses.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.EBT

presentationColumns.name: EBT Margin %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : (EBT / Revenue) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.EBT Margin %

presentationColumns.name: Income Tax Expense
presentationColumns.description: Income Tax Expense metric is the activities for a period range for the INC TAX financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Income Tax Expense

presentationColumns.name: Net Income
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Revenue + Other Income - Cost of Revenue - Sales & Marketing Expenses - Other Operating Expenses - R&D Expenses  - Interest Expense - Income Tax Expense - Depreciation Expenses .
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Net Income

presentationColumns.name: Net Income Margin %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : (Net Income / Revenue) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Net Income Margin %
